Super cool and comfortable

For the first time, keen has let me down, keen shoes are known for room in the toe area, these do not, keen has gone the way of china, and produced a standard shoe, definitely not worth the price. Im willing to spend more on keen shoes because of the quality of fit, im saddened that keen has let quality slip for profit. Not good.

评论概述: LOVE these Keens!  Great shoes for no more than $100
评论详情: I'm a Big Big fan of KEENs --their service industry shoes Saved my feet from Plantar Fasciitis -- so i was "keen" to trying out a more casual off-work sneaker type.  SO COMFY!  They fit me so well from the get-go that I got back online and ordered a second right away.  These won't be water proof, and only time will tell about durability, but they look well built, and my other Keens (the ptc oxford and ptc slip ons) last over a year wearing them 40 hrs a week, on my feet, walkin on concrete.  If you wear Keens already, take note of your size -- I went with the same size as my other Keens and wasn't disappointed.  If you DON'T wear Keens, please note that in my experience, Keens run slightly larger and slightly wider (I love Keen's wider foot base).  I got these shoes when they were around $85, a great price for them.  I wouldn't spend over $100 for them, but that's because I wouldn't spend more than that for a sneaker-type shoe  (my other keens run around $120-$150) but who knows, if these hold up (and maybe I'll try them out at work once my old shoes give out) maybe I would!

I love KEEN shoes, have 5 now and was really looking forward to a comfy pair of sneakers. These fit great out of the box, just as expected, I put my insoles in and went off about breaking them in around the house for two days.....then off for a day and BAM. The right side of the right shoe.....there is a seam there that lands right on top of where the end of the metacarpal is at its widest.....and unlike the left foot, the right was painful to the point where after a few hours I took them off and my foot at that spot was bright red. Maybe just unlucky for me, so I contacted KEEN and got, well, the support was worse than the shoe. I just returned them asfter asking KEEN is there something to be done, even a piece of duct tape over the seam? No conversation just a link to their portal to do a return but they did not notice that I was clear that I bougth from amazon and was looking for ADVICE not return instructions.......maybe you will do better than I did, but just a warning in case.  Again, I love Keeen great shoes uber comfy, just not these, for me.

Love, love, love Keen shoes & these do not disappoint. I ordered Mens because they would arrive quicker and I wanted them for a trip. Immediately sprayed them with protector & put them on. The wide toe box is so comfortable and supportive. I wore these for 12-14 hour days on a trip to Ireland - rain, snow & sun - walking, traveling - and my feet never hurt! When I got home I popped them in the wash and they came out looking brand new! I want every color now!
I need X wide these are not my fault
These are very good quality and they are really comfortable.  Light weight.

Amazing 👏
Very comfortable shoes. I love them.

I feel like my husband is constantly going through shoes. He needs athletic shoes for going on walks in the subdivision with me, going to the gym, and just every day use. I usually buy him name brand shoes and it doesn’t matter, every time they end up getting holes in the bottom after just a few months of use. I wanted to get him a better type of shoe that would last him longer. I will say, they seem like they are a little pricier. However, in my opinion, they are worth it. My husband has been wearing them for over two months now for multiple times a week and they are still going strong with plenty of life left in them. I would definitely pay this if it means that I buy shoes less often than I was prior. He states that these are supportive, fit him well, and are some of the comfiest shoes he has owned. We’ve had keens in the past that held up for a long time so these definitely met my expectations of the brand. I was also pleasantly surprised of the modern look of these shoes compared to the usual hiking type of shoes that they are known for. I expect that I’ll be buying more of these in the future when the time comes for the shoes to be replaced. I have 0 cons with these athletic shoes.
And the color combination is about as popular as you can find today.  Really like the look of these shoes.

评论概述: Comfortable, stylish and supportive, with grippy soles
评论详情: Review of KEEN Men's Ks86 Comfortable Durable Retr  I love these Keen shoes. They instantly became my daily walkers for my 3-mile round trip to the train station and back several days a week. They’re comfortable and well cushioned, and I especially like the knobby grippy soles. I ordered size 10.5 and they perfectly fit my size 10.5 feet.  Earns 5 stars because they’re comfortable and supportive, and look great.

I recently purchased these KEEN Men's Ks86 sneakers, and I love them! They are very comfortable and I love the retro style. But the best part is that they are very durable. I walk a lot, and these sneakers show no wear or tear at all. They are a great investment!

These sneakers are very, very comfortable and thanks to the dark colors they stay looking new. My family is big fans of Keens, so when I saw this cool retro looking kicks I knew they would also have superior comfort. I was right, they feel great, they look great. Five stars
Replace the Keen inserts and you have a great pair of golf shoes.

评论概述: Very firm shoes. Neither hate nor love.
评论详情: So, I’ve been wearing these for about a month now and I don’t love or hate them. They’re honestly just okay. At first they feel like cleats and I felt like I was walking on springs. But you get used to that if you keep wearing them. They’re very firm and there isn’t much for cushioning. But I’m a size 9 (us size) and a size 9 fits me like a glove.  They do have some water resistance to a degree, as my feet don’t get wet when I walk through wet grass. That I very much appreciate.  These do seem well crafted so far and they SEEM like they’ll last a while!
These shoes are very comfortable.  They have a retro feel and don't feel like old man shoes.  Fit me true to size with a nice wide toe box.

I ordered these in the Black/Birch color combination.  What I received were some fantastic-looking  and extremely comfortable sneakers.  Everything appears to be extremely well-made.While I haven't previously known much about this brand,  this pair of sneakers has but Keen on my radar.  I have some other name-brand well-known shoes that are supposed to feel like walking on a cloud.  I believe these sneakers from Keen are more comfortable.While I don't know much about the brand, they do tout themselves as being family-owned and conscientious about their practices,  which I like.These are my new favorite sneakers.  I live this set of shoes.

I'm sort of torn on these sneakers.  They are charmingly just basic sneakers.  But they are almost like basic sneakers that used to be hiking boots.  They are much heavier than your average sneaker, and the bottom tread is more textured than your street style walking/running shoe.  They are comfortable in a basic kind of way, and based on the make, I think they will be very durable.The fit is a bit narrow, but the length is true to size.  If you run wide, these may not be the best for you.  We have 3 people in the household that are about the same shoe size.  I have the widest feet of the 3, and these definitely rubbed on my pinky toe, but my son who has a more medium to narrow foot said they were pretty comfortable.

I have seen Keen sneakers in the fancy shoe store in my city, so I was excited to try these out.  These are very comfortable, and have great grippy soles that are very well cushioned, so walking is quite easy in them. The soles have little circular projections in them, and raising them up like they do makes these good for walking in the rain, as the shoes do not soak up water in that case.The shoes came with standard thin black laces installed but also included a nice set of tubular laces that are black/red/yellow and look very nice on the shoes.  Besides having the rugged raised soles, the soles run along the front and back of the shoes, which gives you more grippyness and keeps the front of the shoes from wearing excessively as some of my sneakers have done.  If you want quality sneakers from a brand name, these are the ones for you.

评论概述: Very comfortable, great traction, true to size
评论详情: I really like these shoes; they’re comfortable, well made and sharp looking with a cool retro style. I also find them extremely comfortable to wear with a great fit that’s true to size. I actually wore them on a recent vacation and had no foot soreness or anything of the sort, and also used them on a couple mile trail that was very vertical and involved rock steps which they handled fantastically, providing very good grip and support. I really don’t have any complaints about them, they’re excellent shoes overall that also happen to look quite nice.

PROS Well made comfortable shoes. They have a lot of bend and give but also feel very durable. Shoes are very light while also having a ton of grip, feels great for all kinds of walking whether it be in the city or an outdoor hike. Style depends on the person, but for the most part these are pretty classic looking shoes that will go with just about any casual outfit.  CONS Not for wide feet. Definitely felt my foot overhanging on the sides and the insoles didn't quite feel right. Didn't deduct from rating as this doesn't claim to be for wide feet nor did it come in wide sizes.  OVERALL Light shoes that you can walk around in all day and will go with all kinds of clothing styles. As long as you don't have wide feet, these are highly recommended.

These KEENs are like a cross between a sneaker, hiking books, and a driving shoe. The upper has a nice retro-fashion vibe, and the nubs one the sole provide complete traction on wet and uneven surfaces.  The "wraparound" of the sole to both the front toe and heel are like a driving loafer: protection of the upper from dirt and wear in your vehicle.
Very comfortable shoes with a nice grippy bottom. Wore these all day walking around the city on vacation and my feel had no blisters or issues.

评论概述: This is my first experience with the KEEN brand, but it won’t be the last.
评论详情: Talk about a great pair of shoes! I am loving these. Apparently KEEN has been making high quality footwear a long time but this is my first pair. I can’t believe how comfortable they are and the arch support is outstanding. I wear a size 11 and they fit perfectly and look great. I have had shoes that cost a lot more but these are actually worth every dollar. The sole design is unique and keeps me sure footed as a mountain goat, which is a good thing because I’m getting to old to be rolling down hills because my feet slipped out from under me. Judging from the construction of these shoes I find them to be extremely durable and should last me a very long time. Great shoe from KEEN!

评论概述: Cool looking with actual arch support.
评论详情: These shoes Are some of the best looking Keens. And with Keens you get comfort and support.

One thing I've learned is to never compromise on quality of shoes you wear. My impressions of these shoes are consistent with the exemplary reputation Keen's upheld since 2003. Most importantly, they're comfortable, supportive, and very well-fitting. Notable features include cushiony soles and a roomy toe area. I've walked several miles in them around town, on pavement. Although they're presented as stylish/lifestyle shoes, Keen didn't compromise on functionality. They seem to have flawless construction and are made from quality materials, like leather. I consider Keen among the premium shoe brands (like Merrell, Ecco, etc.) that expertly research and design what constitute high-quality footwear, and then offer exemplary products worth every penny of their cost. These shoes are a truly worthwhile investment. Five stars ****.
These are nice shoes. They offer plenty of support, are comfortable, look nice, and seem to be very well constructed.

These KEEN Men's Ks86 sneakers are up to the quality of other KEEN shoes I have. The fit is right on, I wear an 11.5 and they give me plenty of room in the toe box without feeling loose. The footbed has good arch support and good cushion for longer walks. The knobby sole has plenty of grip. These KEEN's will last me a long time.

I didn't know Keens made tennis shoes so when I saw these I hopped on them quickly! We have their sandals and they've always been very comfortable and durable. These shoes are lightweight and my feet didn't get hot despite being in 100* weather. I took this on a weekend trip where we were doing a lot of store hopping and window shopping, so lots of walking. These were comfortable and my feet weren't aching as much as they normally would be. I can't speak to their waterproofing since I didn't try to get them wet.

评论概述: Overall good but needs more arch support
评论详情: These are great-looking sneakers, but I did need to add not one but two arch support inserts to make them more comfortable.

This is my first experience with the KEEN brand and I am very pleased with this sneaker. I wear a size 13 and usually hold my breath when ordering size 13's online as many offerings are just too narrow for my foot but these felt comfortable immediately. The insoles are padded nicely and while I am not a fashion expert they look nice to my eye. I would wear them to any semi-casual get together or for everyday. They 'feel' to me like a high quality walking shoe and at my age my 'running' days a well behind me anyway.

These shoes are extremely good quality, as well as comfortable. There is great tread on the bottom, and they're well cushioned inside. The colors are attractive, and they run true to size. They seem like they will last for quite a while!

This is a great looking sneaker! While it says retro, it's really more of a classic. The sizing is accurate, though they do run a tiny touch on the large side, which I prefer for comfort. The fact that they are a wider fit without having to be labeled or priced WW is a plus for me. The padding is comfortable, and it feels and wears like a very durable shoe. It's a very neutral balance, perfect for wearing everyday!!

评论概述: Excellent comfort and quality - KEEN Men's Ks86 Sneakers
评论详情: KEEN Men's Ks86 Sneakers  I am a dedicated fan of Keen footwear. I have owned many, many pairs over the years. When I saw this pair in a sneaker style, I knew I had to get them. I am not disappointed.  I ordered my typical size for Keen - 10-1/2 - and they fit perfectly. The toe box is not too narrow, allowing enough room. There's a removeable insert that appears to be made from a very comfortable and durable foam. So far the comfort when walking and standing is excellent.  The sole is covered in many large nubs, which is Keen's nod to outdoor/rugged focused footwear. The nubs provide outstanding grip on a wide variety of surfaces. These are not running shoes, but rather a sporty active lifestyle shoe. Keen hit the mark perfectly.  The quality of construction and materials is excellent - which is the norm for Keen.  If it isn't obvious, I love Keen as a brand and these shoes. Highly, highly recommended! I'd give 10 stars if possible.
Unique style and very comfortable. Keen shoes are durable too. Love these!
De buen material y muy comodos, un diseño bonito, un buen regalo en cualquier ocasion para para papa, abuelito, tio etc.

As a long-time KEEN fan, I was excited to try the Ks86 Retro Style Sneakers, and they didn't disappoint. I own several pairs of KEEN shoes, and these live up to the brand's reputation for durability and comfort. The retro design is stylish in its own way. The Luftcell footbed provides excellent arch support, and the padded tongue and collar make this all-day wearable. Like my other KEENs, I can wear these for hours without discomfort. The rubber sole offers great grip, and the bruise plate adds protection on uneven surfaces - typical KEEN quality. Fit is true to size, with a good balance of security and toe room. As with all my KEEN shoes, I expect these to last. The leather looks durable, matching the longevity I've experienced with my other pairs. They're slightly heavier than some sneakers, but that's a minor trade-off for the durability KEEN offers. Overall, these sneakers are a great addition to my collection. They blend retro style with the comfort and durability I've come to expect from the brand. These sneakers are a bit on the expensive side, but you get what you pay for. I recommend giving these a try.

Keen Men’s retro sneakers-These shoes look great and fit great. They are called “retro style” but they just look sensible to me. They have sturdy leather reinforcement, so they should last for a long time. The fit is relatively snug around the mid foot but the toe box is roomy. I like the tread. It's a pattern of circular pegs. After a long hike, they seemed to work exactly as they should. I googled some references to this shoe and some sites are calling them mountain shoes, implying they have some capability for climbing. Really they are intended to be everyday sneakers. I don’t know exactly what that means, but I didn’t have any trouble hiking in them. They have a feature called a bruise plate. I couldn’t find any pictures or further description, but I assume it is some sort of insert in the sole that protects you on rough ground. One feature I like is the finger pull strap on the heel. Far too many shoes come equipped with a weeny little strap that you can barely get your finger in. Not so here. It's a good size and provides a good grip. All things considered, I like these shoes and give them 5 stars.
